pageProduct.name: Opsite Flexifix Gentle Transparent Adhesive Roll 10cm x 1m
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Transperent Silicon Adhesive Film

Warnings

Store in cool, dry, well-ventilated area away from strong oxidising agents. Observe specific labelled storage requirements. Disposal: in accordance with local waste regulations. Always read the label and instructions before use

Common Uses

• Keeping dressings in place
• Prevention of blisters and pressure sores
• Providing discreet invisible fixation.
• The gentle silicone adhesive minimises the risk of damage to the skin

Ingredients

Silicon Dressing

Directions

• Providing discreet invisible fixation for Sensitive Skin
